basic_information.scholarship_name: The Allen Holcomb Wise Business Endowed Scholarship

description: Awarded to General Business in College of Business, see preferences Criteria shall be: Undergraduate Students (2) enrolled full-time, United States Citizen. 3.0 GPA required and completed 60 hours at UCO. Preferences given in order of importance: 3 (a) General Business, Accounting, Finance 1st year awarded to 1 student $875.00 (2025) after second year of interest earned it can be awarded to 2 students $875.00 each, total of $1750 for 2026

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Busn Admin-General Business   or SIS_Major is Finance   or SIS_Major is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt   or SIS_Major is Finance-Banking   or SIS_Major is Finance-Financial Planning   or SIS_Major is Finance-Insurance   or SIS_Major is Finance-Risk Management   or SIS_Major is Business Admin-Accounting
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Finance-Real Estate   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Busn Admin-General Business   or SIS_Major is Finance   or SIS_Major is Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt   or SIS_Major is Finance-Banking   or SIS_Major is Finance-Financial Planning   or SIS_Major is Finance-Insurance   or SIS_Major is Finance-Risk Management   or SIS_Major is Business Admin-Accounting
criteria.clean_description: Major: Accounting, Business Admin-Accounting, Busn Admin-General Business, Finance, Finance-Banking, Finance-Financial Planning, Finance-Insurance, Finance-Insurance & Risk Mgmt, Finance-Real Estate, Finance-Risk Management
